targets.expr:
100 *
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace!=""})
/
scalar(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory",unit="byte"}))

100 *
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace!=""})
/
scalar(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory",unit="byte"}))

100 - (
  100 *
  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace!=""})
  /
  scalar(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory",unit="byte"}))
)

100 *
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace!=""})
/
scalar(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu",unit="core"}))

100 *
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace!=""})
/
scalar(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu",unit="core"}))

100 - (
  100 *
  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace!=""})
  /
  scalar(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu",unit="core"}))
)

panels.title: Top nodes by Memory requests / allocatable, %
Top nodes by CPU requests / allocatable, %

targets.expr:
topk(
  10,
  100 * sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",namespace!=""})
  / scalar(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"}))
)

panels.title: Top namespaces by Memory requests / cluster allocatable, %

targets.expr:
topk(
  10,
  100 * sum by (namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",namespace!=""})
  / scalar(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"}))
)

panels.title: Top namespaces by CPU requests / cluster allocatable, %
Top pods by restarts + OOMKilled flag (24h/7d)
Top pods by CPU throttling ratio (5m)

panels.description:
Memory requests minus peak working set over the last 6 hours.
Shows how much memory (GiB) is safe to reduce even under observed peak usage.
Values are calculated for Running pods only.
panels.title: Top namespaces by safe memory waste vs peak (6h)

panels.description: Requests âˆ’ peak CPU usage over the last 6h. Values show millicores that are safe to reduce even under observed peaks.
panels.title: Top namespaces by safe CPU waste vs peak (6h), mCPU

panels.description:
Relative deviation of memory requests from the current Working Set.
Calculated as (Requests / Working Set âˆ’ 1) Ã— 100 for each pod/container.

Positive values indicate over-requested memory (potential for optimization).

Negative values indicate under-requested memory (risk of eviction / OOM under load).

Values reflect the current state and do not account for historical peaks.
panels.title: Request vs Working Set (current), %

ÐœÐµÑ‚Ñ€Ð¸ÐºÐ¸:

â€¢ CPU request: kube_pod_container_resource_requests

targets.expr:
topk(
  30,
  clamp_min(
    (
      sum by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace",resource="cpu"} and on(namespace,pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1))
      -
      sum by (pod, container) (max_over_time(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",pod!="",container!="",image!=""}[2m])[6h:]))
    ) * 1000,
    0
  )
)

panels.title: CPU requests vs usage (delta)

targets.expr:
topk(
  30,
  clamp_min(
    (
      sum by (pod, container) (max_over_time(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",pod!="",container!="",image!=""}[2m])[6h:]))
      -
      sum by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace",resource="cpu"} and on(namespace,pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1))
    ) * 1000,
    0
  )
)
